name: 10waves1boss.io
description:
10waves1boss.io is a simple tower defense game where players must defend against incoming waves of monsters!

How to play:
Use WASD or arrow keys to move your unit.
Left Click to use items.
Press [B] to buy weapons and upgrades.
Press [N] to hide your name.
Press [M] to play the background music.

Tip: use logic to defeat your enemies! Area damage items are much more efficient when enemies are close to each other.

Each time you exit the game, your gold will be saved and reloaded when you log in.
